title: Olympic hack shows new threat in cyber crime
text:
Olympic hack shows new threat in cyber crime 8:31pm GMT - 00:06 
Kaspersky researchers reported on Thursday that the ''Olympic Destroyer'' computer virus used to attack the Pyeongchang Winter Games was embedded with fake digital fingerprints to make investigators believe the attack was done by hackers linked to North Korea. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Kaspersky researchers reported on Thursday that the "Olympic Destroyer" computer virus used to attack the Pyeongchang Winter Games was embedded with fake digital fingerprints to make investigators believe the attack was done by hackers linked to North Korea. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2IboSjP
